attributes.action: FULL HIGH SPEED RAIL FOR THE NORTH EAST
attributes.additional_details: THE NORTH EAST OF ENGLAND SHOULD BE INCLUDED IN THE DEVELOPEMENT OF HIGH SPEED RAIL. THE WHOLE OF THE NORTH EAST NEEDS THIS DEVELOPEMENT AND TO IGNORE A REGION OF THREE MILLION PEOPLE IS TO DISCRIMANATE AGAINST THEM AND STOP THEM HAVING THE SAME BENIFITS AS THE REST OF THE COUNTRY.
